text: A gauge of Chinese stocks listed in Hong Kong surged almost 7% intraday  rebounding from its lowest close since late 2005. However  it pared gains after Chinese Foreign Ministry spokesman Zhao Lijian said he’s “not aware” of a government committee to assess ways to exit Covid Zero.
